name: Ta Khrai Cafe
description: The Ta Khrai Cafe includes a large selection of Thai food, with a menu that includes a vegetarian section. They also have several affordable lunch specials on weekdays.

name: Bombay Indian Grill
description: The Bombay Indian Grill serves authentic Indian food, with several options both vegetarian and non-vegetarian. They also offer an assortment of desserts.

name: Oryza
address: 51 Donahue Dr 103, 5407 University Town Center Dr
description: Oryza is an Asian restaurant which offers made to order cuisine based on rice. Toppings include specially grilled meats and tofu, as well as an assortment of vegetables and sauces.

name: Cairo 2 Go
description: Cairo 2 Go serves fresh Middle-Eastern style cuisine, and they specialize in shawarma, which they describe as a Middle Eastern-style taco of burrito.

name: Los Mariachis
description: Los Mariachis is a Mexican restaurant with with 2 locations in the Morgantown area. They offer several lunch combos as well as Mexican-style desserts and beverages.

name: Table 9
description: Table 9 offers a variety of pub-style sandwiches and similar foods/beverages. They also have a breakfast menu including omelets and other similar items.

name: Yama
description: Yama is an Asian restaurant offering udon, a Japanese noodle soup, as well as sushi and other Asian foods.

name: Mario's Fishbowl
description: Known for their fishbowls of beer, Mario's Fishbowl serves sandwiches, wings, and other pub-style foods.

name: Ogawa
description: Ogawa is a Japanese restaurant that has served sushi and other Japanese dishes to Morgantown for over 10 years.

name: Lotsa Stone Fired Pizza
description: Lotsa Stone Fired Pizza serves small made-to-order personal pizzas, and its location on High Street makes it a popular eating location for WVU students.

name: Pies and Pints
description: Pies and pints offers pizza, sandwiches, and other pub-style food along with an assortment of craft beers. It is located 5 minutes from the main campus of WVU.

name: Black Bear Burritos
description: Black Bear Burritos serves a large assortment of burritos of different styles in a casual setting.

name: Stefano's
description: Stefano's serves Italian and American style dishes in a more upscale setting. They are closed on Sundays and Mondays.

name: Volcano Japanese Restaurant
description: Volcano is a Japanese restaurant specializing in sushi and rolls. It offers aeveral affordable lunch deals as well as a vegetarian menu.

name: Istanbul Restaurant
description: Istanbul Restaurant serves Turkish food including falafels and gyros and offers free delivery.

name: Pizza Al's
description: Pizza Al's is a more traditional pizza restaurant offering hoagies and calzones in addition to the pizza. It is popular among WVU students.

name: Green Tea Asian Fusion
description: Green Tea Asian Fusion offers fresh sushi as well as Japanese, Chinese, and Thai cuisine as well as an assortment of desserts and teas.

name: Crab Shack Caribba
description: Crab Shack Caribba offers a large selection of seafood as well as daily specials and live entertainment on Fridays and Saturdays.

name: Boston Beanery
description: Boston Beanery is an American style restaurant which serves steak, seafood, salads and other pub-type foods.

name: Cheese Louise
description: Cheese Louise is an American restaurant that specializes in a variety of unique grilled cheeses and similar items.

name: Hill & Hollow
description: The Hill & Hollow is a more upscale restaurant which serves steaks, craft beers, and other similar items.

name: Chaang Thai Restaurant
description: Chaang Thai is self-described as the one and only authentic restaurant in Morgantown. They offer lunch specials, outdoor seating, and live music at scheduled times.

name: Salam Restaurant
description: A Middle Eastern-style restaurant, Salam Restaurant serves an assortment of sandwiches and pizzas with a Middle Eastern spin.

name: Blue Moose Cafe
description: Blue Moose Cafe is a coffee house that serves coffee, tea, and a variety of pastries and snacks. They also offer various breakfast items.

name: Lefty's Place
description: Lefty's Place is a traditional pizza restaurant that also serves a variety of wings and salads.

name: Varsity Club
description: A pub-style restaurant, Varsity Club is a go to spot for game days. They offer a variety of sandwiches and related pub grub.

name: The Grind
description: The grind is a coffee shop that serves breakfast and lunch items in a casual atmosphere.

name: Rio Verde
description: Rio Verde is an authentic Mexican restaurant that has a variety of options. They reccomend the Special Dinner, which includes a variety of what they have to offer.

name: Almost Heaven Bar & Grill
description: The Almost Heaven Bar & Grill offer a variety of pub style foods and is a popular eatery among WVU students.

name: Saladworks
description: Saladworks is a unique restaurant that serves a large assortment of made-to-order salads. It is a great option for more health-conscious individuals.
